attributes.action: make a statement declaring US actions in Syria namely killing eight unarmed civilians in Abu Kamal illegitimate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if you think that the cross border attacks taken by the US militiary are wrong and break laws and conventions then you may wish to sign this petition! I've never taken any political action before; but after seeing the story on the news I felt I needed to use my right of freedom of speech to make some kind of statement.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
